00042 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00043 template<typename DSS, typename Adapter>
00044 inline
00045 bool 
00046 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>
00047      ::initConvexityConcavity( DSS &aDSS,  
00048                                Adapter* &anAdapter,
00049                                const typename DSS::ConstIterator& i ) {
00050 
00051   bool flag; 
00052   if ( aDSS.getRemainder(i) < (aDSS.getMu()) ) {      //concave part
00053     flag = false;
00054     anAdapter = new Adapter4ConcavePart<DSS>(aDSS);
00055   } else {                                            //convex part
00056     flag = true;
00057     anAdapter = new Adapter4ConvexPart<DSS>(aDSS);
00058   }
00059   return flag;
00060 }
00061 
00062 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00063 template<typename DSS, typename Adapter>
00064 inline
00065 void 
00066 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>
00067      ::mainAlgorithm( DSS &currentDSS, Adapter* adapter, 
00068                       bool isConvex, 
00069                       typename DSS::ConstIterator i, 
00070                       const typename DSS::ConstIterator& end )  throw( InputException ) {
00071 
00072   ASSERT(adapter != 0);
00073 
00074 //std::cerr << "first DSS" << std::endl;
00075 //std::cerr << currentDSS << std::endl;
00076 
00077   while (i != end) {
00078 
00079     //store the last leaning point 
00080     //if the first and last leaning points 
00081     //of the MS are not confounded
00082     if (adapter->firstLeaningPoint() != adapter->lastLeaningPoint()) {
00083       myPolygon.push_back(adapter->lastLeaningPoint());
00084     }
00085 
00086     //removing step
00087     while (!currentDSS.isExtendable(i)) {
00088       //remove a point from the back
00089       if ( currentDSS.retract() ) {
00090         //store the last leaning point
00091         if (adapter->lastLeaningPoint() != myPolygon.back()) {
00092           myPolygon.push_back(adapter->lastLeaningPoint());
00093         }
00094       } else {
00095         //disconnected digital curve
00096         throw InputException();
00097       }
00098     }
00099 
00100     //remove the last leaning point 
00101     //if the first and last leaning points 
00102     //of the current DSS are not confounded
00103     if (adapter->firstLeaningPoint() != adapter->lastLeaningPoint()) {
00104       myPolygon.pop_back();
00105     }    
00106 
00107     //adding step
00108     while ( (i != end)&&(currentDSS.extend(i)) ) {
00109       //store the first leaning point
00110       if (adapter->firstLeaningPoint() != myPolygon.back()) {
00111         myPolygon.push_back(adapter->firstLeaningPoint());
00112       }
00113       ++i; //move forward
00114     }
00115 
00116     //transition step
00117     if (i != end) {
00118 
00119       if ( (isConvex)&&( currentDSS.getRemainder(i) < 
00120                         (currentDSS.getMu()) ) ) {
00121         //from convex to concave
00122         isConvex = false;
00123         delete (adapter);
00124         adapter = new Adapter4ConcavePart<DSS>(currentDSS);
00125       } else if ( (!isConvex)&&( currentDSS.getRemainder(i) >= 
00126                                 (currentDSS.getMu()+currentDSS.getOmega()) ) ) {
00127         //from concave to convex
00128         isConvex = true;
00129         delete (adapter);
00130         adapter = new Adapter4ConvexPart<DSS>(currentDSS);
00131       }
00132     }
00133 
00134   }
00135 
00136 //std::cerr << "last DSS" << std::endl;
00137 //std::cerr << currentDSS << std::endl;
00138 
00139   //last removing step
00140   while (currentDSS.retract()) {
00141     //store the last leaning point
00142     if (adapter->lastLeaningPoint() != myPolygon.back()) {
00143       myPolygon.push_back(adapter->lastLeaningPoint());
00144     }
00145   }
00146 
00147 }

00150 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00151 inline
00152 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::FP(
00153   const TIterator& itb, 
00154   const TIterator& ite ) throw( InputException ) 
00155 {
00156   FP(itb, ite, false);
00157 }
00158   
00159 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00160 inline
00161 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::FP(
00162   const TIterator& itb, 
00163   const TIterator& ite, 
00164   const bool& isClosed ) throw( InputException ) 
00165  : myFlagIsClosed( isClosed ) 
00166 {
00167 
00168   TIterator i = itb;
00169   if (i != ite) {
00170 
00171     if (myFlagIsClosed) { 
00172       //first maximal DSS
00173       Circulator<TIterator> citb(i,itb,ite);
00174       DSSComputerInLoop firstMS(citb); //init
00175 
00176       //backward extension
00177       Circulator<TIterator> back( citb );
00178       do {
00179         --back; 
00180       } while (firstMS.extendOppositeEnd(back));
00181       //forward extension
00182       Circulator<TIterator> front( citb );
00183       do {
00184         ++front; 
00185       } while (firstMS.extend(front));
00186 
00187       //local convexity
00188       bool isConvexAtFront; 
00189       Adapter<DSSComputerInLoop>* adapterAtFront;   
00190 
00191       isConvexAtFront = initConvexityConcavity<DSSComputerInLoop,Adapter<DSSComputerInLoop> >
00192                                                                 (firstMS,adapterAtFront,front);
00193 
00194       bool isConvexAtBack; 
00195       Adapter<DSSComputerInLoop>* adapterAtBack;  
00196 
00197       isConvexAtBack = initConvexityConcavity<DSSComputerInLoop,Adapter<DSSComputerInLoop> >
00198                                                                 (firstMS,adapterAtBack,back);
00199 
00200       //first point 
00201       if (adapterAtFront->firstLeaningPoint() == adapterAtFront->lastLeaningPoint()) {
00202         myPolygon.push_back(adapterAtFront->lastLeaningPoint());
00203       }
00204 
00205       //set end iterator
00206       typename DSSComputerInLoop::Point leaningPoint; 
00207       if ( ( (isConvexAtFront)&&(isConvexAtBack) ) 
00208         || ( (!isConvexAtFront)&&(!isConvexAtBack) ) ) {
00209         leaningPoint = adapterAtFront->lastLeaningPoint();
00210       } else {
00211         leaningPoint = adapterAtBack->firstLeaningPoint(); 
00212       }
00213       do {
00214         ++back;
00215       } while (*back != leaningPoint);
00216       ++back;
00217 
00218       //call main algo
00219       mainAlgorithm<DSSComputerInLoop,Adapter<DSSComputerInLoop> >
00220                                 (firstMS,adapterAtFront,isConvexAtFront,front,back);
00221       delete (adapterAtFront);
00222       delete (adapterAtBack);
00223 
00224       //remove the last point
00225       myPolygon.pop_back();
00226     
00227     } else { 
00228       //list of successive upper (U) and lower (L)
00229       // leaning points. 
00230       std::list<Point> vTmpU, vTmpL;
00231       vTmpU.push_back(*i);
00232       vTmpL.push_back(*i);
00233 
00234       //longest DSS
00235       DSSComputer longestDSS(i); //longest DSS
00236       ++i; //move forward
00237       while ( (i != ite)&&(longestDSS.extend(i)) ) {
00238         //store the first upper leaning point
00239         if (longestDSS.getUf() != vTmpU.back()) {
00240           vTmpU.push_back(longestDSS.getUf());
00241         }
00242         //store the first lower leaning point
00243         if (longestDSS.getLf() != vTmpL.back()) {
00244           vTmpL.push_back(longestDSS.getLf());
00245         }
00246         ++i; //move forward
00247       }
00248 
00249       bool isConvex; //TRUE if longestDSS begins a convex part, FALSE otherwise
00250       Adapter<DSSComputer>* adapter; //adapter for the current DSS
00251 
00252       if (i != ite) {
00253 
00254         isConvex = initConvexityConcavity<DSSComputer,Adapter<DSSComputer> >
00255                                                        (longestDSS,adapter,i);
00256   
00257         if (isConvex) myPolygon = vTmpU;
00258         else myPolygon = vTmpL;
00259 
00260         //call main algo
00261         mainAlgorithm<DSSComputer,Adapter<DSSComputer> >
00262                            (longestDSS,adapter,isConvex,i,ite);
00263         delete (adapter);
00264 
00265       } else {
00266         //the part is assumed to be convex
00267         //if it is straight
00268         myPolygon = vTmpU;
00269         isConvex = true;
00270         adapter = new Adapter4ConvexPart<DSSComputer>(longestDSS);
00271       }
00272 
00273     } //end closed/open test
00274 
00275   } //end itb == ite test
00276 
00277 }

00305 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00306 template <typename OutputIterator>
00307 inline
00308 OutputIterator
00309 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::copyFP(OutputIterator result) const {
00310   typename Polygon::const_iterator i = myPolygon.begin();
00311   while ( i != myPolygon.end() ) {
00312     *result++ = *i++;
00313   }
00314   return result;
00315 }

00317 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00318 template <typename OutputIterator>
00319 inline
00320 OutputIterator
00321 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::copyMLP(OutputIterator result) const {
00322 
00323   unsigned int n = (unsigned int) myPolygon.size();
00324   if (n < 3) { //special case < 3 points
00325 
00326     typename Polygon::const_iterator i = myPolygon.begin();
00327     for ( ; i!= myPolygon.end() ; ++i) {
00328       *result++ = RealPoint( *i );
00329     }
00330 
00331   } else {    //standard case
00332 
00333     typename Polygon::const_iterator i, j, k;
00334     i = myPolygon.begin();
00335     j = i; ++j; 
00336     k = j; ++k; 
00337 
00338     if (myFlagIsClosed) { 
00339 
00340       //first point
00341       *result++ = getRealPoint(myPolygon.back(),*i,*j);
00342       //middle points
00343       while ( k != myPolygon.end() ) {
00344         *result++ = getRealPoint(*i,*j,*k);
00345         ++i; ++j; ++k; 
00346       }
00347       //last point
00348       *result++ = getRealPoint(*i,*j,myPolygon.front());
00349 
00350     } else { 
00351 
00352       //first point
00353       *result++ = RealPoint( myPolygon.front() );
00354       //middle points
00355       while ( k != myPolygon.end() ) {
00356         *result++ = getRealPoint(*i,*j,*k);
00357         ++i; ++j; ++k; 
00358       }
00359       //last point
00360       *result++ = RealPoint( myPolygon.back() );
00361 
00362     }
00363 
00364   }
00365   return result;
00366 }
00367 
00368 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00369 inline
00370 DGtal::PointVector<2,double>
00371 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>
00372    ::getRealPoint (const Point& a,const Point& b, const Point& c) const {
00373 
00374   RealVector shift;
00375 
00376   Vector e1 = b - a; //previous edge
00377   Vector e2 = c - b; //next edge
00378 
00379   if ( (e1[0]*e2[1]-e1[1]*e2[0]) <= 0 ) {
00380 
00381     //convex turn
00382     if ( (quadrant(e1,1))&&(quadrant(e2,1)) ) {
00383       shift = RealVector(0.5,-0.5);
00384     } else if ( (quadrant(e1,2))&&(quadrant(e2,2)) ) {
00385       shift = RealVector(-0.5,-0.5);
00386     } else if ( (quadrant(e1,3))&&(quadrant(e2,3)) ) {
00387       shift = RealVector(-0.5,0.5);
00388     } else if ( (quadrant(e1,4))&&(quadrant(e2,4)) ) {
00389       shift = RealVector(0.5,0.5);
00390     } else {
00391       ASSERT(false && "DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::getRealPoint: not valid polygon" );
00392     }
00393 
00394   } else {
00395 
00396     //concave turn
00397     if ( (quadrant(e1,1))&&(quadrant(e2,1)) ) {
00398       shift = RealVector(-0.5,0.5);
00399     } else if ( (quadrant(e1,2))&&(quadrant(e2,2)) ) {
00400       shift = RealVector(0.5,0.5);
00401     } else if ( (quadrant(e1,3))&&(quadrant(e2,3)) ) {
00402       shift = RealVector(0.5,-0.5);
00403     } else if ( (quadrant(e1,4))&&(quadrant(e2,4)) ) {
00404       shift = RealVector(-0.5,-0.5);
00405     } else {
00406       ASSERT(false && "DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::getRealPoint: not valid polygon" );
00407     }
00408 
00409   } 
00410 
00411   return ( RealPoint(b) + shift );
00412 }
00413 
00414 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00415 inline
00416 bool
00417 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>
00418    ::quadrant (const Vector& v, const int& q) const {
00419 
00420   if (q == 1) {
00421     return ( (v[0]>=0)&&(v[1]>=0) );
00422   } else if (q == 2) {
00423     return ( (v[0]>=0)&&(v[1]<=0) );
00424   } else if (q == 3) {
00425     return ( (v[0]<=0)&&(v[1]<=0) );
00426   } else if (q == 4) {
00427     return ( (v[0]<=0)&&(v[1]>=0) );
00428   } else {
00429     ASSERT(false && 
00430      "DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::quadrant: quadrant number should be 0,1,2 or 3"  );
00431     return false;
00432   }
00433 }

00438 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00439 inline
00440 void 
00441 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::selfDrawAsPolygon( Board2D & aBoard) const
00442 {
00443   //polyline to draw
00444   vector<LibBoard::Point> polyline;
00445 
00446   typename Polygon::const_iterator i = myPolygon.begin();
00447   for ( ;i != myPolygon.end();++i) {
00448       Point p = (*i);
00449       double xp = NumberTraits<TInteger>::castToInt64_t(p[0]);
00450       double yp = NumberTraits<TInteger>::castToInt64_t(p[1]);
00451       polyline.push_back(LibBoard::Point(xp,yp));
00452   }
00453 
00454   if (myFlagIsClosed) {
00455       Point p = (*myPolygon.begin());
00456       double xp = NumberTraits<TInteger>::castToInt64_t(p[0]);
00457       double yp = NumberTraits<TInteger>::castToInt64_t(p[1]);
00458       polyline.push_back(LibBoard::Point(xp,yp));
00459   }
00460   aBoard.drawPolyline(polyline);
00461 
00462 }

00480 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00481 inline
00482 void
00483 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::selfDraw( Board2D & board ) const
00484 {
00485   std::string mode = board.getMode( styleName() );
00486   if ( mode == "Polygon" )
00487     selfDrawAsPolygon( board );
00488   else if ( ( mode == "Both" ) || ( mode == "" ) )
00489     {
00490       selfDrawAsPolygon( board );
00491     }
00492   else
00493     {
00494       mode = "DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::selfDraw: Unknown mode "+mode;
00495       ASSERT2(false,  mode  );
00496     }
00497 }

00501 template <typename TIterator, typename TInteger, int connectivity>
00502 inline
00503 void
00504 DGtal::FP<TIterator,TInteger,connectivity>::selfDisplay ( std::ostream & out ) const
00505 {
00506   out << "[FP]" << endl;
00507   typename Polygon::const_iterator i = myPolygon.begin();
00508   for ( ;i != myPolygon.end();++i)
00509   {
00510     out << "\t " << (*i) << endl;
00511   }              
00512   out << "[end FP]" << endl;
00513 }
